arts.ttl: McLaughlin's crisp volley gives Mansfield hard-fought victory at Stevenage
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Stevenage are knocked out of the FA Cup after missing a host of first-half chances before a well-taken volley by Mansfield Town defender Stephen McLaughlin sends the Stags through to the FA Cup third round.

arts.ttl: Stephen McLaughlin strike sends Mansfield past Stevenage in FA Cup
Stevenage lose 1-0 to Mansfield Town in FA Cup second round
arts.sum: The Mansfield Town winner in the 1-0 success came three minutes into the second period with a really well-hit shot from Stephen McLaughlin. The Stags only sniffs of goal came from Lucas Akins, when he suddenly skipped past Murphy Cooper only to be shepherded away by Nathan Thompson, and a tame shot from distance by Ben Waine.

arts.ttl: Rene Howe and Ronnie Henry on Stevenage's FA Youth Cup win
arts.sum: Lead coach Rene Howe said: "The main thing was that we won and the way the boys plugged together and worked hard and had that desire to still continue after conceding in the dying seconds, that is a testament to what Jorden [Gibson] and Ronnie [Henry] have basically given me and what I'm coaching now. "He hasn’t scored but he’s got an assist and that’s those little bits where he's holding up and bringing players in and linking the play.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stevenage vs. Mansfield Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's FA Cup clash between Stevenage and Mansfield Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
